intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you do to stay fit?

respond_situations.description: You are lost in the street.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You want a cup of tea.

respond_situations.starter_line: Hello! What would you like to buy?
respond_situations.description: You are at a small shop. You want to buy some bread.
You are looking for a book.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You are in a store. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a toy.
You want to ask a stranger for the time. ..

listening_script.text: Children play games at the playground. They play tag and hide and seek. Friends laugh and run together. The sun is shining. It is fun to play outside.

follow_up_questions.question: When do you celebrate this festival?
Where do you go for this festival?
Why do you like this festival?
